acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field ecVCW4Zp2w cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 38 byteObjectField = 53 shortField = 100 shortObjectField = 21 charField = o charObjectField = Z intField = -684942359 intObjectField = -1390888919 longField = 247975301986881 longObjectField = 247975301941528 floatField = 0.5335713 floatObjectField = 0.0036008358 doubleField = 0.8557393655608814 doubleObjectField = 0.1748978443404844 stringField = BM8hjL7W_r objectField = java.lang.Object@601ebfa1 calendarField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:21 BST 2015 dateField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:21 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@78e1625f intArray = [I@446e20c0 booleanArray = [Z@3f11add1 bigDecimalField = 250434577235 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{_bE87D3TTS=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 33 byteObjectField = 102 shortField = 19 shortObjectField = 74 charField = o charObjectField = c intField = 1005005990 intObjectField = 1161367534 longField = 247975307368380 longObjectField = 247975307332838 floatField = 0.3435604 floatObjectField = 0.22109306 doubleField = 0.9350853770182982 doubleObjectField = 0.5377930542448991 stringField = P_DKQFrQU5 objectField = java.lang.Object@601ebfa1 calendarField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:21 BST 2015 dateField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:21 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@129294c3 intArray = [I@4ca5eb61 booleanArray = [Z@551a17f1 bigDecimalField = 250434577235 ) should contain at least one non empty element
